title: I need to get this typography of numbers
content:
Hi everyone;

Could you help me to find this kind of typography? All the numbers are the same typography but each one I got it of diferent photos. I need to get these kind of numbers.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418185804im_/http:/typophile.com/files/numbers_5696.jpg)
author: oskrbt1983

comments.content: where I can get it??? or how I can apply that effect to Geneva (Bold)??
It appears that Geneva Compressed is bold so you just need Geneva Compressed (also known as GenevaCmpr) Google?
yes man, thank you so muchh
